name: Contact Me
description:
Please find their secrets in the game.
The game is a 2D puzzle-solving horror game, you may need to restart the game constantly to advance the progress.
It may be difficult for people who don't often play horror puzzle games, but you will gradually find the joy of finding them.

Contact Me is a 2D horror game.
Please have heart or mental illness people carefully decide whether to play.
If there are adverse reactions, please quit the game.


In a strange world, what is waiting for you to wake up or the truth?
Maybe you wake up in a strange world...
Maybe you'll wake up and come back...
Maybe you can find out the truth?
It's up to you, self.
"Contact me," it said
Where am I now? How is the world? Why am I under water?
......No, I have to turn you off


Keyboard:
WASD: Move
J: Check
K: Close/Touch
L: Pack
I: Use

Game are seven endings
Five stars in the game
Find Eat

You can explore the world, and good luck.

Thanks for playing this game

If you run into bug. Contact Me

(I am not very good at English. The translation is not very good, please forgive me)
